html:
8.14.18  12:39 pm   how do you not get bored answering all these questions

     i play sudoku at the same time

8.14.18  12:38 pm   can you not answer this question?

     i'll see what i can do

8.14.18  11:20 am   how come "All U Need Is Love" isn't on spotify? i love that one!

     it probably should be

8.14.18  11:00 am   Is it worth rekindling an old friendship?

     it depends how good the friendship was

8.14.18  9:33 am   CAN I SEND YOU AN ORANGE?

     can you email it to me

8.14.18  9:00 am   do you think marijuana should be legalized?

     i'm not sure why it was illegalized

8.14.18  8:57 am   why does nothing ever go right

     that gives you the fun of making it right

8.14.18  8:12 am   Do you like the word "heck"

     sometimes

8.14.18  7:24 am   how do i get a girlfriend

     you must be the girlfriend

8.14.18  7:23 am   why do people get drunk

     it makes the alphabet more fun to say

8.14.18  6:11 am   Did you add the anagram posted date because of the complaints that you weren't adding any anymore?

     yes

8.14.18  6:03 am   how do I get over a fear of always making music that's somehow derivative or too similar to other artists when it's what flows naturally out of my idea canal

     have you considered taking a long walk in the jungle
8.14.18  5:58 am   what does hallelujah mean

8.14.18  5:35 am   are you gonna make videos on your older songs

if so can you make a music video for "guess ive got to listen to bob marley"

if not can you make a music video for "what love is"

     that sounds like a good idea but what i might do instead is make new songs and make videos for them

8.14.18  5:15 am   how do you answer questions

     if you know the answer just say the answer, if you don't know the answer you will have to make something up

8.14.18  5:04 am   What the fuck is xoxo 

     i'm not sure

8.14.18  4:49 am   What questions do you ask yourself 

     what the hell is going on here

8.14.18  4:26 am   I like to eat pasta, do you prefer nachos?

     i wonder if you can combine the two, somehow

8.14.18  3:25 am   What happens if I add chocolate milk to macaroni and cheese?

     it will turn brown

8.14.18  2:55 am   3/4

3..45./2...../1..23./lo7...../lo6.lo7.1./lo5...3./4..321/2...../
3..45./2...../1..23./lo7...3./4.3.1./1...lo7./1.1235/8.1.../

Do you think this notation works for writing ideas down quickly?

     yes that actually looks almost identical to what i would do if i only have access to text

      Do you have any suggestions from your experience?

     might be important to write down the tempo. whether by bpm estimate or another song comparison. the instant fingerprint of the entire song is often sealed vividly in the exact tempo

8.14.18  2:02 am   i'm afraid that i'm a psychopath. what should i do?

     figure out what psychopaths do and don't do that

8.14.18  1:52 am   how do i stop being worried about college 

     go there?

8.14.18  1:40 am   what is the best note to trigger emos?

     c

8.14.18  12:53 am   Who what when where why?

     you this now here what

8.14.18  12:14 am   what's your Top Ten

      that depends which way is up

8.13.18  11:42 pm   your tweets seem to be pretty Up To Date with the memes but i know youve said before that you tend to just post on youtube and then not go on it afterwards so how do you stay current

     via the questions page

8.13.18  11:19 pm   On what day do you plan on releasing the new video?

     as soon as humanly possible

8.13.18  10:45 pm   What is the proper use for the word "Neat-o?"

     like if you see one of those propeller hats

8.13.18  10:30 pm   On 5.24.17 8:31 pm you revealed more about your current song than you seem to be doing now.

     that's not true

      Any reason why your attitude's changed?

     that's not an attitude change. the hints are always easy to recognize after the song is released. but before the song is released the hints might be staring you plain in the face and you might not even know. keen viewers already know most of the chorus lyrics to the new song

8.13.18  10:05 pm   Was the song that you wrote that made no sense when you were outside the brooklyn museum 'brooklyn museum', or is that line from 'brooklyn museum' about writing another different song, or is it a fictional story?

     it's a true story, but most of those bits got ironed out and adjusted several years later to actually make them more true. the 'i just wrote a song' song originally did not mention 'no sense' nor the 'brooklyn museum' but the later re-write of 'i just wrote a song' did mention those things, which were true

8.13.18  9:45 pm   what novel inspires you to create songs?

     i haven't seen a novel in many years although i am not doubting they exist

8.13.18  9:32 pm   When you're writing a song, do you ever like to have something like a very loose road map in your mind to kind of guide your writing... like maybe some ideas about musical/lyrical elements you want to incorporate, or some type of structure or form you're aiming towards, or a certain feeling you want to portray, etc? 

     yes

8.13.18  9:00 pm   why is practicing guitar SO FRUSTRATING?!?!? 

     perhaps you are becoming eager to do it for real

8.13.18  8:44 pm   can i eat water

     i think so

8.13.18  8:32 pm   Do you hate india

     no

8.13.18  8:00 pm   in your own words, why has Chad's tourism industry failed?

     we can debate on this for hours and days, but at the end of the day what it simply comes down to is just not enough people were taking the damn tours

8.13.18  7:40 pm   i don't like pants, how do i get myself to like pants

     why exactly do you want to like something you don't like

8.13.18  7:16 pm   In the I am the mailman video, are you trying to tell viewers that you make your own videos

     no that line was improvised but i suppose that each and every one of us is the mail man in our hearts

8.13.18  6:40 pm   How do I find ghosts

     you must think like a ghost

      and why aren't they real?

     ah that makes it more fun to find them because then it feels like you've done something impossible

8.13.18  6:24 pm   What would you advice be to someone like me with OCD?

     tell stories about ocd?

8.13.18  5:57 pm   what are the four best countried in the wordl

     oh i'm not falling for that one again. each time i pick the best ones, different ones become better

8.13.18  4:26 pm   What's the name of the game?

     the blame game

8.13.18  4:10 pm   why haven't you done a Monday video for the last 137 mondays

      i already did too many

8.13.18  3:46 pm   Who would win in 1 on 1, you or michael jordan?

     if i could predict the winners of fights before they happen, i would be spending a lot more time in the casino and less time in the boxing ring

8.13.18  3:42 pm   hi bill! my grandma got a new cat recently and the name it came with is very hard for her to pronounce (it's called sfouf). for this reason, she would like for it to have a new name, what's a good cat name?

     any name can be a good cat name, it really depends on which cat it is

8.13.18  2:26 pm   why is my lamp making a ringing noise

     that is the sound of light

8.13.18  2:39 pm   How can I waste more time?

     so far you are wasting plenty of time

8.13.18  1:56 pm   thoughts on gun control?

      some days you wanna just get out there and control the hell out of some guns

8.13.18  1:44 pm   https://billwurtz.com/note20090512b.html i feel like there's something really interesting about this note, but as someone who hasn't performed very much i don't 100% know what it means. could you explain the idea behind it a little more?

     sometimes performers plan what they are going to on stage. but for a thrill, try not planning it, and things will get very intimate very fast

8.13.18  1:41 pm   Hi, do you do any sort of live performances?

     not right now

      If not, do you plan to in the future?

     yes
